description: Comprehensive view of syndicate participation details for tranches, including deal information, participant roles, and current status
use_cases: Monitor syndicate participation across deals, track underwriter allocations, analyze participant roles and responsibilities, review tranche status and progress
data_returned: Deal names, tranche IDs, syndicate participant details, roles, allocation amounts, and current tranche status

columns.name: syndicate_participant_role
columns.description: Role of the participant in the syndicate

columns.name: deal_date
columns.description: Date when the deal was created

sample_queries: SELECT deal_name, COUNT(*) as participant_count FROM V_TRANCHE_SYNDICATES GROUP BY deal_name
SELECT * FROM V_TRANCHE_SYNDICATES WHERE deal_date >= CURRENT_DATE - 30
view_sql: CREATE VIEW V_TRANCHE_SYNDICATES AS SELECT d.deal_id, d.deal_name, t.tranche_id, t.status_id as tranche_status_id, sp.participant_id as syndicate_participant_id, sp.participant_name as syndicate_participant_name, sp.role as syndicate_participant_role, ta.allocation_amount, d.deal_date FROM deals d JOIN tranches t ON d.deal_id = t.deal_id JOIN tranche_allocations ta ON t.tranche_id = ta.tranche_id JOIN syndicate_participants sp ON ta.participant_id = sp.participant_id
